data.title: Family of Arthur George Suckling and Jessie Mann
data.text:
Name:

Arthur George Suckling1,2

Sex:

Male

Father:

-

Mother:

-

Occupation:

solicitors clerk then as a clothiers clerk becoming a mens clothier and outfitter3,4,5

Birth:

10 Apr 1885

Saffron Walden, Essex, England2,3,4,5,6

1901 census says born in Halstead Essex

Census:

5 Apr 1891 (age 5)

Station Road, Saffron Walden, Essex, England6

son attending school and living with his parents William and Adelaide, brother William, and sister Adelaide. Born in Saffron Walden Essex

Census:

31 Mar 1901 (age 15)

59 Trinity Road, Halstead, Essex, England3

son as A George working as a solicitors clerk and living with his parents W Frederick and Adeleade (sic), brother W Frederick, and sisters A Sarah and M Clara. Born in Halstead Essex

Census:

2 Apr 1911 (age 25)

35 Whiting Street, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England4

an unmarried boarder living in six rooms with Christmas and Matilda Creasey and two other boarders. Born in Saffron Walden Essex

Census:

29 Sep 1939 (age 54)

18 Victoria Street, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England5

a married men's clothes and outfitter and a member of the Voluntary A&S? Dept:Detachment Suffolk BCRS Assistant Commandant Office living with his wife Jessie. Born on 10th April 1885

Death:

7 Aug 1950 (age 65)

Bury St. Edmunds "Registration District", Suffolk, England7,8

Probate:

6 Sep 1950

Probate Registry, Arcade Street, Ipswich, Suffolk, England8

of 18 Victoria Street Bury St. Edmunds died 7th August 1950, administration of Â£591 11s 10d (~Â£18,000 in 2017) to Jessie Suckling widow

Name:

Jessie Mann9

Sex:

Female

Father:

Charles Henry Mann (1837?-1908)

Mother:

Harriet Emily Whitehead (1837-1915)

Occupation:

dressmaker10,11

Birth:

27 Aug 1878

Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England5,9,10,12,13

1939 register says born 27th August 1879

Census:

3 Apr 1881 (age 2)

Duke of Edinboro, 19 Butter Market, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England12

daughter living with her parents Charles and Harriet, sisters Mary and Emma, her widowed grandmother Maria, and a servant. Born in Bury St. Edmunds Suffolk

Census absence:

5 Apr 1891 (age 12)

Census:

31 Mar 1901 (age 22)

3 St. Andrews Street South, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England10

unmarried daughter working as a dressmaker and living in four rooms with her parents Charles and Harriet, and niece Nellie Mann. Born in Bury St. Edmunds Suffolk

Census:

2 Apr 1911 (age 31)

59 Guildhall Street, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England11

unmarried daughter working as a dressmaker and living in four rooms with her widowed mother Harriet. Born in Bury St. Edmunds Suffolk

Census:

29 Sep 1939 (age 61)

18 Victoria Street, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England5

married doing unpaid domestic duties and an ARP Casualty Service Nurse living with her husband Arthur. Born on 27th August 1879

Administrator:

6 Sep 1950 (age 72)

Jessie Mann was appointed as an administrator at the probate hearing of Arthur George Suckling on Wednesday on 6 September 1950 at the Probate Registry, Arcade Street, Ipswich, Suffolk, England

Death:

8 Apr 1961 (age 82)

St. Marys Hospital, Hospital Road, Bury St. Edmunds, Suffolk, England14,15

Probate:

10 May 1961

Probate Registry, Arcade Street, Ipswich, Suffolk, England15

a widow of North Court Northgate Street Bury St. Edmunds died 8th April 1961 at St. Mary's Hospital Bury St. Edmunds, probate of effects of Â£743 9s 3d (~Â£15,000 in 2017) to William Arthur Juby retired tailor and Edward John Newton bank official
